animeDescription: An evil monkey, Specter, has escaped a circus, using a mind-controlling device which allows him to become smarter and have access to controlling the monkeys. Kakeru is called over by a professor in order to capture all the monkeys, including the one's who's controlling them: Specter.  (Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['Saru Getchu: On Air 2nd', 'Letchu, Getchu, Saru Getchu']
